presumption.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I had feelings of discontent when seeing others' accomplishments or blessings, and secretly wished they would lose their advantages?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I felt envy towards others' accomplishments and secretly wished they would not achieve them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others would lose their good fortune, success, or blessings?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language, violating their dignity through my words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or hurtful language, thereby violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
especially during social gatherings or celebrations
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially during social gatherings or celebrations?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
over a healthy and balanced life
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading me to prioritize fleeting pleasures over a healthy and balanced life?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed my desire for entertainment or leisure to take precedence over my financial responsibilities, leading me to excessively indulge in wasteful habits?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: for myself and those who depend on me
prodigality.question: Have I excessively prioritized indulging in recreational activities over fulfilling my financial responsibilities, thereby neglecting my duties to provide for myself and those who depend on me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking about others ' private affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in speaking about others' private affairs, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs through conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs through conversations, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
